```{r echo = FALSE, fig.margin=TRUE, results = "asis"}
load("write_info.RData")
input <- our_info

template <- paste("

%s. %s.

")
# dont't forget the newline

for (i in seq(nrow(input)-1)) {
current <- input[i, ]
cat(paste0("# ",current$module,"\n"))
cat(paste0("# Summary \n"))
cat(paste0(current$decision, "\n"))
cat(paste0("![](", "pic", i, ".pdf){width=65%}","\n"))
cat(paste0("### Evidence \n"))
cat(sprintf(template, current$summary_stat, current$decision))
}
```
